projectDesc.p: This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

body.ab:
juṁ kalavan· guru sayoga, na:han taṁ sinaṅguḥ guru nihan taṁ śvara
riṁ guru la:ghu vuvusən·, kveḥnya savaṙgga muṅguh ikanaṁ vacan aniga
ka:ragaṇa la:ghu madhudhuk i tṅaḥ hetunikaṁ śaka:ragaṇ ama:tyəṅ a
na:, na:karaga:ṇa təlva madhuluṙ tika ya laghuṁ paḍa nyan laghu ka:rva saṅ guru
3
manitaḥ sira tika manata nihan gaṇani haṙyya yeṅtakna, jaka:ra kalavan· bha
matətəg·, Ikaṁ padha kapuṙvvaka tlu kunaṁ, gnəp· rvavlas aṁgəpanya kukuran· kapiṁ rva
nikanaṁ jaka:ra matətəg·, kapiṁ rva maṅnəm· dvitīya kaśula, padha: rva
ruṇa bharuṇa śaraṇa, Avaraṇa bharaṇa hapaṇa ṇa gəṁ 0
niśa, vika:śa mva ma:śa: daśa diśi śvahat· śūra raśika, śiva: śambuḥ śūla triśula śuśala śrīvava śiva, śavaḥ vaṅśa: veśyaḥ śavari śivira:ka:śa śacaya R̥̆̇ kṣaṇi kṣiṇi kapakṣa lakṣmi śanaya:hahәmm a:nidi, kagantuṅa guma
ntuṅeṁ dhadha kunaṁ sapr̥tthītala, prahr̥ṣṭi parituṣṭa roṣa ruṣa koṣa tr̥ṣṇa praṣa, śakaṙṣaṇa ṣavr̥ṣṇi vr̥ṣṭa ṣalu:maḥ śapr̥tthika mahaṙṣi mahiṣī mahoṣada maheṣa meṣa: muṣa, R̥ṣaḥ muṣika puṣya poṣya kapuṣah praṣaṣṭa
:maṣa, ṣadhaṅguli ṣadhaṅga bhūṣaṇa ṣabha:ṣa duṙbha:ṣita, Aṣa: paṣadhayo ṣadhīṣu viṣama dvipaḍa:ṣaṇa bhaviṣyati hiriṣya haṙṣyana puṣaḥ huṣaḥ śaddha len·, viṣa: viṣaya yomi śeṣa dadi ma:nuṣa: kaṣaya, nvata: kaluṣa ki
lviṣa: ṅayuṣa kaṣmala: ka:maṣa, nyataṁ mami yoṅgviṁ naṣa maR̥naḥ naṅindha taya R̥̆̇ śa:ka:ga mvaṁ sapr̥tthī sadulur ika R̥ṅәn· yekihәn· vaṙṇnanәn ta, śuśruṣa: śiṣya śikṣa śviśita vtunikaṁ huśvaṣa: śeṣaśeśan·, śuśvat·
5
śiśinya śośvi śiṣinaka śaśi de kaṁ vaṣiṣṭa: śaviṣṭi, maṅka: tekaṁ śa ṭa:voṙ śa tayat iṅtiṅәt· yeki śaksat· vtunya ma:ṣanikaṁ sata nihan· vuvusən padhanya, sa:dū sada: sata sabha: sisi ta:sita:si, sәta: susatya
rasa satriya sa:ri saṁ hyaṁ, svera svabha: sarīsarī sati sa:risa:ri samva: sava: basumatī basusena sunuḥ mva haikava:sa hupava:sa vinә:sa va:sa, duṙba: si duṙyyasana duṙbyasana prasastha, byaṙ sa:sa sa:du sasivin sapujin sapū⌈
jan· sa:svaṅga saṅga sigi seṅgita saṙgga sajja, sә:gәḥ sgaṁ siga sugiḥ sigiran saga:sor·, sa:svaṙgga sa:gara sagorava⌈ sa:dhaka svaṁ, rat kosvaniṁ sata śarat· paknanya saksat· R̥̆̇ sura sapta saraḥ sarasa sira sada· samasiḥ mapasәn·
savara suta saha, savinaṁ savanәn· sakala sakavasa, praja nanmi sadyantya niti kamivara R̥̆̇ Iti paruṅguniṅ akṣara R̥̆̇ nyan sutrasandi vuvusәn·, parakr̥ta lviṙnika patiṅkaḥnya, Atambayan·, havkasan·, na:han ta ya: sinaṅguhan⌈
vaṙṇna tinikaḥ pinarva vkasan·, Ikaṁ namaḥ yekihәn· śvara ṅarannya, yapvan kapuṙvva hanta, sinaṅguhan· vyaṁñjana: na:ma L̥, yan ta hadi sa:mana, kumut· sinami, I, puṙvvaka, vkasan· ghoṣa, sahlesah ri svabatәk·, A I U R̥ L̥,
, lviṙnya kavruhana diṙgha: ṅaranya manhәr·, A I U R̥ L̥, limaṁ viji sa:haya, sandy akṣara muvah aṅgәpan·, EAi O Au, na:han· lviṙnya R̥̆̇ ka kha, ca cha, ta tha, pa pha, sakatlu nihan sahayaniṅ aghoṣa, ga: gha: ṭa di ya ra la
vaha, siṇoṣan· rakva na:manika vaṙgga ṅaranya limalikur·, ka pinakapuṙvvanikaṅ ma, mavkasan pinakavkasnya , ka ga kalimanya ya śuddhan·, ra śa ṣa: sa ha yanya vuddhavudhaḥ Anunasika ṅa ña na na:ma, Antastha ṅaranika ya ra⌈
lava:tut·, usmana śa ṣa ha ṣimidaḥ, patiṅkaḥniṁ sutra santike R̥̆̇ sampun pratekanikanaṅ akṣaraṁ ri vyañja:na: lavan· śvara, tucapa ta sañjata nikhahәn·, prakarani ṅaranya kavruhana ṅaranikaṅ hulu savaneḥ, makuṭa ruku
h aśrama:sthaka kaphala, tijakula śekara masiraḥ, na:han ta parina:maniṁ śr̥ṅga diṙgha: hulu mapalenan·, Utək lavan kambara kuñcir·, majaṭa magumbak· majambul aṅurai, svana: mani diṙgha: yan· riṅ hulu vindu lavan madhana kunaṅ, kunaṁ
ṅ kunaṁ, lantara: la:van· vintaṁ, tilaka titik kani surahan·, na:han ta parinamanīṁ canda nyan taṁ cakra jantra guluṅan·, sudhaṙṣaṇa: yuddhakr̥ṣṇa len sakaṭa, daka:na:ma yeki huniṅan·, mvaṅ añakra hulu yukti kavruhana yapvan ikaṁ taliṅa
nihan·, kuṇḍala sumpiṁ capiṁ len· kaṙṇna, śrota suvәṅ mvaṅ iṅtiṅәt·, phalaga suna:ma:ni taliṅa diṙgha: ṅaranya, tulalai, Iku taṅan· vastra len· galah adava, kirivila kuñca yaśa vaneḥ, Asiṅ adava: diṙgha: rakve
